# <a name="advanced-outlookcom-security-for-microsoft-365-subscribers"></a><span data-ttu-id="6f9f7-102">Segurança avançada do Outlook.com para assinantes do Microsoft 365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6f9f7-102">Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6f9f7-103">Todos os usuários do Outlook.com se beneficiam da filtragem de spam e malware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6f9f7-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6f9f7-104">Para assinantes pessoais do Office 365 Home e do Office 365, o Outlook.com realiza uma triagem extra de anexos e links em mensagens recebidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6f9f7-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6f9f7-105">Para saber mais, leia [segurança avançada do Outlook.com para assinantes do Microsoft 365](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6f9f7-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6f9f7-106">Para ativar ou desativar os links seguros, vá para [as configurações de segurança Premium](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6f9f7-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
